activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012606 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012606 MO instance.
